com.m3rcuriel.controve.components

Interface Clock


  • public interface Clock
    A generalized way to measure current time with generators for system and fpga.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long currentTimeInMicros()
      Get the current clock time in microseconds.
      default long currentTimeInMillis()
      Get the current clock time in milliseconds.
      default long currentTimeInNanos()
      Get the current clock time in nanoseconds.
      static Clock fpga()
      Generator method to create a clock from the FPGA.
      static Clock fpgaOrSystem()
      Attempts to create a clock from the FPGA.
      static Clock system()
      Generator method to create a clock from the system time.

    • Method Detail

      • currentTimeInMicros

        long currentTimeInMicros()
        Get the current clock time in microseconds.
        Returns:
        the long representation of time in microseconds

      • currentTimeInNanos

        default long currentTimeInNanos()
        Get the current clock time in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        the long representation of time in nanoseconds

      • currentTimeInMillis

        default long currentTimeInMillis()
        Get the current clock time in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the long representation of time in milliseconds

      • fpga

        static Clock fpga()
        Generator method to create a clock from the FPGA.
        Returns:
        the Clock representing the FPGA

      • system

        static Clock system()
        Generator method to create a clock from the system time.
        Returns:
        the Clock representing system time

      • fpgaOrSystem

        static Clock fpgaOrSystem()
        Attempts to create a clock from the FPGA. If there is no FPGA, it will fall back on the system clock.
        Returns:
        the Clock representing the FPGA, or as a fallback, the system time.
